item.title: Randomizers. Ineractive game.
item.description: Spark AR filters Spark AR filters could be not just beautiful, but fun too. You can easily create interaction with your audience and gain new followers with it. The process looks like this: You describe your ideas; We discuss everything; I work on the filter; I send a filter testing link, so you can try it on; You approve it; I send you the files. You will get:

item.title: Tattoos everywhere on your face or/and body
item.description: Spark AR filters Tattoos that sticks to your face or/and body. You can choose your own design. The process looks like this: You describe your ideas; We discuss everything; I work on the filter; I send a filter testing link, so you can try it on; You approve it; I send you the files. You will get: Filter file; Filter icon; Instructions on how to upload a filter.

item.title: Current date, time, day of the week...
item.description: Spark AR filters You can add current time, date, day of the week to any filter. The process looks like this: You describe your ideas; We discuss everything; I work on the filter; I send a filter testing link, so you can try it on; You approve it; I send you the files. item.title: Hair color, make up
item.description: Spark AR filters Change hair color. Choose any color that you like or want to try. Good for stylist or for hair dye products company. The process looks like this: You describe your ideas; We discuss everything; I work on the filter; I send a filter testing link, so you can try it on; You approve it; I send you the files. You will get: Filter file; Filter icon; Instructions on how to upload a filter.
